ComicInfo.Title: Unbalanced Pieces, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Tracking supernatural killers was a lot easier when Sara Pezzini, bearer of the Witchblade, lived in her hometown of New York and was a police detective. Now she must do it while avoiding butting heads with the Chicago PD and trying to make ends meet as a private detective. The new creative team of TIM SEELEY (HACK/SLASH) and DIEGO BERNARD (The Man With No Name) continue to shake up the status quo of WITCHBLADE! Featuring two covers by JOHN TYLER CHRISTOPHER (ARTIFACTS) and DIEGO BERNARD!
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Arif Prianto,Dennis Calero,Diego Bernard,Fred Benes,John Tyler Christopher
